content.html:
QA is actually really difficult and requires a boatload of critical thinking skills, and good QA is rare and incredibly valuable. -person who has worked as a software engineer with multiple QA departments and has also worked in QA (me)

content.value:
QA is actually really difficult and requires a boatload of critical thinking skills, and good QA is rare and incredibly valuable.

-person who has worked as a software engineer with multiple QA departments and has also worked in QA (me)

content.html: My hot take is that QA is harder than SWE. SWE: model a solution to some problem. QA: model the problem, model the solution, model the interactions between those models and identify whether something about it is "wrong" and also how and why it's wrong.
content.value:
My hot take is that QA is harder than SWE.

SWE: model a solution to some problem.
QA: model the problem, model the solution, model the interactions between those models and identify whether something about it is "wrong" and also how and why it's wrong.
